transcript:
Customer: Ae watan watan mere aabad rahe tu.
Ae watan watan mere
Hello
Executive: Hello sir, abhi voice aa rahi hai na meri?
Customer: Ji ji ab wo aawaz aa rahi hai.
Executive: Haan ji boliye sir ab aap.
Customer: Sir aapko us wale package mein koi query ya fir kuch bhi laga ho?
Executive: Mam main inquiry to main iske package ke bare mein na ye bhi bata do aapko. Theek hai mujhe thoda sa samay do.
Executive: Haa.
Customer: Mujhe thoda sa samay do uske baad to uske baad mein bata do.
Executive: Koi dikkat nahi hai sir dekhiye main aapko ye keh rahi hu na, theek hai? Theek hai sir main aapko apne side se main aapko bas yehi keh rahi thi ke koi bhi agar aapko ye product mein aapko koi doubt laga like jo maine aapko bataya usme se koi doubt aapko ye puch rahi hu main aapse.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Main aapse puch rahi hu aapko jo maine package product bataya usme aapko koi doubt hai ya nahi?
Customer: Nahi nahi doubt to kuch nahi hai agar mere ko doubt kuch nahi hai wo to main thoda sa main main aapko hai na samay thoda sa main wo kar main bata du aapko main isliye. Kyunki abhi aap puch rahe the.
Executive: Aap puch rahe the. Aap mujhe kab tak like sir clear karke bata dijiyega like aaj kal mein?
Customer: Nahi sir main haan main aaj kal mein bata du clear mam aapko hai na thoda sa ye.
Executive: Main ek baar na aapko proposal share kar de rahi hu sir aapka kya amount ban raha hai. Accha aapko ek saal ke liye theek lag raha hai ya fir do saal ke liye kya aapko sahi laga? Kaun sa aapke according better lag raha hai abhi?
Customer: To main filhal mein 50 wala according theek lag raha hai mam.
Executive: Kaun sa?
Customer: 50,000.
Executive: 50,000.
Customer: Theek hai. Main ek baar aapko bata deti hu sir aapka jo bhi amount wagera ban raha hai aapko main ek baar proposal apne side se share kar de rahi hu aap ek baar check kar lo dekh lo. Theek hai jo bhi hoga aap mujhe whatsapp pe call pe jo bhi hoga clear kar dena okay?
Customer: Theek hai mam.
Executive: Baaki sir aapko video meet wagera to ho gaya na abhi aapko kuch doubt wagera usme to nahi hai na aapko proposal wagera?
Customer: Nahi nahi. Nahi nahi.
Executive: Theek hai. To sir main isko close kar de rahi hu aapne na ek concern raise ki thi na samne se video meeting ki kal, hai na?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To sir usme na aapko na like like jata hai ek request karke ki aapki video meeting ki jo request thi wo fulfill ho gayi ya fir nahi. To usme aapko satisfied wagera ka jata hai to usme aapko yes kar dena hai. Theek hai agar aapka aap agar fulfill ho satisfied ho IndiaMART se to fir. Okay?
Customer: Theek hai. Theek hai mam.
Executive: Theek hai sir okay. Theek hai sir thank you haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs time to decide on package.

- Customer inquired about package details.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to share a proposal.

- Executive explained video meeting satisfaction confirmation.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will review proposal and revert.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, proposal, video meeting
